name: Disk Wars
description:
Currently, the game is under development. This is more of a mechanics test than anything else. Any feedback on the Mechanics, Aesthetics, Bugs, etc. are appreciated.

The Disc Wars of the Grid are ravaging the system. Security Protocols run rampant, anyone in their path faces deresolution. Fight, Survive, Take Down the System. (Wave based System, Player Death not implemented for bug testing)

#tron #disney #cyberpunk #flynn #glow #unity #datadisks #shooter #fps #indie #earlyaccess
